title: (x) Identify Bridgehead Fonts - Mrs Eaves Italic {Mike F}
content:
Looking to identify primarily the font used for "Learn about coffee."

Link:

[http://www.bridgehead.ca/en/AboutUs/coffee.asp?SID=193407767227476197102...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045234/http:/www.bridgehead.ca/en/AboutUs/coffee.asp?SID=193407767227476197102237792123635236839082678100201336482921&LangID=1& "http://www.bridgehead.ca/en/AboutUs/coffee.asp?SID=193407767227476197102237792123635236839082678100201336482921&LangID=1&")

I have identified Baskerville and Copperplate for other portions of the site. Any others that jump out would be appreciated.

Thanks as always!  
Sean.
author: Antics
